title: Super Smash Bros for Nintendo 3DS - Wii U Soundtrack
description:
This is the full soundtrack that was given away on Club Nintendo to people who purchased both the 3DS and Wii U versions of Super Smash Bros. It includes 2 discs BLUE (which has 36 songs from the Wii U version) and RED (which has 36 songs from the 3DS version). Songs were ripped directly from the CDs with ~256 VBR.
